content.prompt: Which of the following was a nearly universal motivation for royal patronage of the arts in the early modern period?

choices.label: The desire to spread Protestant ideas
The desire to enhance prestige and authority
The desire to provide employment for artists and artisans
The desire to promote new artistic styles to replace traditional representational art
